pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Huan2 jing4 Gui1 hua4 shu3

definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: The United Nations Environment Programs (UNEP)highly praised the implement of ban for free plastic bags in China.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國環境規劃署盛讚中國實施“限塑令”。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhang Shigang is holding the position of UNEP Country Coordinator in China.
sentences.chinese: 張世鋼先生現任聯合國環境規劃署駐華代表。

sentences.english: In year of 2010, Yuan was given the title of "Great Master of Environmental Art" by UNEP.
sentences.chinese: 年榮獲聯合國環境規劃署授“環保藝術大師”稱號。

sentences.english: The UNEP assessment is being paid for by Shell.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國環境規劃署的評估是由殼牌集團贊助的。
